IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: On November 7th, 2023, M/Tpr Kelly Jaskiewicz of the Northern Region Criminal Investigation Division responded to 10 Furnace Ct, Cockeysville, MD 21030 for a reported fraud. The victims Jane Trommatter advised she was scammed out of approximately $3,000.00 while attempting to purchase a dog online. Jane had been searching for a new dog as her older dog was in the process of dying. Jane was convinced to get a dog by a priest she helps to take care of, although she did not think she was ready for one yet. Jane had previously provided copies of emails and screenshots of the text conversations she had along with proof of the money she sent to Cpl Hall. Review of the information provided shows that Jane sent the money through numerous money applications (money gram, Zelle, PayPal) and even utilized her credit card. The suspect(s) used several phone numbers, names and emails to complete the elaborate scam. Full review of the information provided shows that Jane paid $3,200.93 for a dog she never received. The communication ended with the suspect(s) advising the dog was being sent to quarantine law court due to her failure to comply with the vaccine requirements. I requested Jane to show me her bank account and the money she paid. Jane showed me four payments delivered. Two payments were completed on 10-11-2023 to Brya Galloway for a total of $1,599.00. These payments were completed through Zelle. Two additional payments were completed on 10-10-2023to Cynthia Akuchia for a total of $650.00 completed through Zelle. After review of the documents provided I showed Jane a document with a payment that appeared to be through MasterCard utilizing the PayPal application. Jane pulled up the account and showed me how $951.93 was paid to Liam Shaw on 10-11-2023. It appears this money was converted into pounds. I have identified additional investigative leads to follow up on from the information provided to me from the victim: PETS SELLER Elizabeth F. Kraus 1230 Fording Island Rd. Bluffton, SC 29910, (515)850-2147 elizabethfkraus@gmail.com PayPal- shawliam715 4029357733 CA 95131 USA , shawliam382@gmail.com EMAIL contact - info.globalpetslogistics@gmail.com Listed as USA branch - Mark William, 11818 Riverside Dr. Ste 118 Valley Village, CA 91607, 707-706-0764, 760-502-0830, 887-202-7698 Brya Galloway- Recipient token- 470-361-6708 also 470-361-4768 Glenillia Galloway- 6197123114 number to use for Zelle Number associated with the tracking- (864)865-6088 Sent money on Money Gram- Micheal Touli- 3401 38th St. NW Apt 202, Washington DC, 20016 address provided by 864-865-6088- 405 Christopher Ave, APT 9 MONEY GRAM transfer reference # 24995371 Seller phone number that texted victim- (515)850-2147 Cynthia Akuchie- 2407023983 (possible phone number) also used on Zelle. Phone number that texted victim about shipping puppy- (864) 865-6088 Jasmine Morales 2028308332 (possible phone number) used for Zelle I have contacted Baltimore County States Attorney office to review the case facts. Case open pending additional information
